00015   class CasAuthPlugin {
00016     /* Variables */
00017                 private $casServerHostname;             
00018                 private $casServerPort;                         
00019                 private $casServerURI;                          
00020 
00025     function CasAuthPlugin() {
00026       // Include the config file, that sets the following variables
00027                         include_once("config.php");
00028                         
00029                         // Use it to set the object properties
00030                         $this->casServerHostname=$casServerHostname ;
00031                         $this->casServerPort=$casServerPort ;
00032                         $this->casServerURI=$casServerURI ;

00056     function disconnect(){
00057                         // Load the CAS module
00058                         include_once('CAS/CAS.php');
00059 
00060                         // Start CAS, and use it to disconnect
00061                         phpCAS::client(CAS_VERSION_2_0, $this->casServerHostname, $this->casServerPort, $this->casServerURI);
00062       phpCAS::logout("http://".$_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"].$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]);
00063                         
00064                         // Really ? Well, should not be ever executed, because phpCAS::logout()
00065                         // redirects to another page, or exit()s the php script if failure.
00066       return true;
00067     }   
00068 
00079                 function autoAuth() {
00080                         // Instanciate phpCAS
00081                         include_once('CAS/CAS.php');
00082                         phpCAS::client(CAS_VERSION_2_0, $this->casServerHostname, $this->casServerPort, $this->casServerURI);
00083                         
00084                         // Do CAS authentication (force it)
00085                         phpCAS::forceAuthentication();
00086                         
00087                         // If the CAS authentification was successful, phpCAS will get us back
00088                         // here and return the user login. Just what we needed !
00089                         return phpCAS::getUser();
00090                 }
00091   } // class CasAuthPlugin
00092 ?>
